title: Intersecting 5-brane solution of N=1, D=10 Dual Supergravity with \alpha' corrections
abstract: A vacuum solution of anomaly-free N=1, D=10 Dual Supergravity is constructed. This vacuum corresponds to the presence of two 5-branes, intersecting along M_4, and possesses N=1, D=4 supersymmetry.
